results: Computed Eckhaus and zigzag stability boundaries
Computed invasion front speeds and wavenumbers
Demonstrated the effectiveness of numerical continuation for studying pattern formation and stability
title: Numerical Continuation and Bifurcation in Nonlinear PDEs Stability, Invasion and Wavetrains in the S.pdf
